[isEmpty](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.isempty.md)

## EditorPlugin.isEmpty() method

Will be used to decide if the plugin is empty (e.g. to decide whether we can
safely delete the plugin). If not provided, we consider a plugin empty iff its
state equals its initial state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEmpty?(state: StateTypeReturnType<S>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                         | Description       |
| --------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------- |
| state     | StateTypeReturnType&lt;S&gt; | the current state |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the plugin is empty
